sentences.sContent: Life breeds both plenitude and void, exuberance and depression.
sentences.sContent_eng: Life breeds both plenitude and void, exuberance and depression.
sentences.sCn: 生活同时孕育充足与空虚，繁荣与萧条。

sentences.sContent: When Cosette went out with him, she leaned on his arm, proud and happy, in the plenitude of her heart.
sentences.sContent_eng: When Cosette went out with him, she leaned on his arm, proud and happy, in the plenitude of her heart.
sentences.sCn: 珂赛特和他一道出门时，她总紧靠在他的臂膀上，心里充满了自豪和幸福。

words.tran: 充分地；完全地；有全权地
充分（表示情况、状态丰富）
